2. Power on - watch animated faces cycle 3 times
3. See 'Ask a stupid question and SHAKE ME!' message
4. Ask any question (stupid ones work best)
5. Shake the device vigorously (or during animation to skip)
7. Read your sarcastic answer with smooth fade-in
8. Watch faces cycle: disappointed â†’ angry â†’ confused (or shake to skip)
9. Ball ends on disappointed face, judging you silently
10. Only 1 second cooldown before next shake!
